name: Allen, Beast Beckoner
effect: On Enter: Glimpse 3, then reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Harmony or Melody card, put it into your hand. As long as you control two or more Animal and/or Beast allies, Allen gets +2 level.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Glimpse 3, then reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Harmony or Melody card, put it into your hand.
As long as you control two or more Animal and/or Beast allies, Allen gets +2 level.

rule.description: To get Allen's +2 level effect active, you can either control two Animals, one Animal and one Beast, or two Beasts.

flavor: "I'm working on a tune. Care to listen?"
